## Instructions

Watch [Version Control with Git](YouTube link), follow along with the exercises, and submit a link to your toyPipeline repository from GitHub.

## Grading
* For full credit
  * Submit your repository on time.
  * Your repository should contain:
    * Multiple commits
    * At least one conflict
    * A .gitignore file.
